name: Haunt and Decay
description:
You are haunting a secret facility. But the soldier you are controlling is being decayed if you stay at him for too long.
Controls: W, A, S, D to move.
Aim with mouse.
E: Activating possess shot (you possess what you hit next).
The green bar is your Decay bar and the red bar is your Health bar.
Try to survive as long as you can.
